Description: NI House Condition Survey District Council Key Measures 2011. (Basically a subset of House Condition Survey Main Data Tables)
Name: House Condition Survey District Council Key Measures
Notes: Small table of total number of number dwellings and % non decent  and % unfit by NI council area. All data subset of NI House Condition Survey report.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified under heading Previous Housing Condition Survey Reports 2001/2014 labelled as House-Condition-Survey-District-Council-Key-Measures-2011.
Sizing Notes: May extend the 2016 survey as time series data, but needs assessing to see if it matches, and then there is a file per year to process
